column4: Russell Cave Rd between Ferguson Rd and Carrick Rd
column5: A single truck reportedly struck a pole and a hydrant.  At least one lane is blocked.

column4: Outbound Versailles Rd at Van Meter Rd
column5: One lane is blocked.  Traffic backed up to New Circle Rd.

column4: Inbound Harrodsburg Rd at Pasadena Dr
column5: The left turn lane is partially blocked.

column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
